data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample GLENN-81

Exposition S, Slope 5 deg, Geology: Silikat Hangschutt, Tree line 300 m, av. Tree height 22 m, Tree cover 80%, Shrub cover 75%, Herb cover 60%, Moss cover 20%, Vegatation type: Heterog. Fi/Bi-Best. an stark gegl. S'hangf, Film number: 719A
